#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>
int main()
{
	char s[]="abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz";
	char r[]="zyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcba";
	int t,n,i,k,j;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		scanf("%d",&n);
		k=n%25;j=n/25;
		if(k>0)
		{
			for(i=k;i>=0;i--)
			printf("%c",s[i]);
		}
		while(j--)
		printf("%s",r);
		printf("\n");
	
		
		
	}
	
 
return 0;
}
